We are R2-Cerified and have a Zero Landfill Policy!

- Call today to schedule a pickup! [888-970-S3RS](tel:8889707377)


[Client Portal](https://s3erpportal.makor-erp.com/portal)

[![S3 Recycling Solutions Logo](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/S3-logo-white-for-web-375-x-144.png)](https://s3rs.com/)

Contact Us[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2025-02-21T18:04:49+00:00

## We’re waiting for your call

If you are interested in learning more about S3’s services,

please fill out the form below and one of our representatives will reach out shortly.

### Give us a call

[**1-888-970-7377**](tel: 1-888-970-7377)

**MONDAY-FRIDAY (7AM-4PM)**

### Send us an email

[**info@s3rs.com**](mailto:info@s3rs.com)

**24/7/365**
